title: Something with Blood in the Title
description: Horror Stories - Murder Poems - Creepypasta  Featuring "My Friend the Serial Killer" a 25 page expose' on real life murderer Bryan Patrick Miller, including info the cops don't know and never before seen pictures.  Also featuring "In Defense of Horror Films" a lost article by horror legend VINCENT PRICE.Check out ChainsawAlice.com
author: Khurt Khave
